sanctions.third_offense: Two-day suspension, may include Disciplinary Probation

violations.description: Violation of Section 10 (Proper Uniform, Dress Code and Related Rules/Regulations)

Unauthorized use of materials like chalk, board marker, board, and others inside the classrooms, laboratory rooms, library, audio visual room, auditorium, amphitheatre, multi-faith chapel, and other function rooms
Making all forms of disturbances such as excessive noise, loud use of mobile phones and other gadgets that tend to disrupt classes
Posting, distributing or disseminating notices, posters, leaflets without prior approval
Unauthorized removal of official notices, posters, streamers, tarpaulins
Littering within University premises
Smoking outside within 30-meter radius from the campus perimeter
Breaking into a class or College-sponsored activities without permission
Acts of mischief and/or misbehavior during University-sponsored activities
Unjust vexation or annoying/pestering any individual in the University
Provocation to a fight
Public Display of Affection (PDA)
Failure to attend required university activities and programs

sanctions.third_offense: Four- to five-day suspension (4-5), may include Re-admission Probation

violations.description: Committing more than three (3) minor offenses of any nature within a semester
Refusal to obey legal order of a person of authority

sanctions.second_offense: Five- to seven-day suspension (5-7), may include Re-admission Probation
sanctions.third_offense: Seven- to nine-day suspension (7-9), may include Non-readmission

violations.description: Smoking anytime within University premises
Possession of and/or intoxication with alcoholic beverages within University premises
Entering University premises in a drunken state
Unauthorized entry to the University premises or facilities
Unauthorized use of University facilities and properties
Acts which endanger the safety of any individual within University premises
Possession of gambling paraphernalia and/or engaging in gambling

sanctions.first_offense: Grade of zero (0) in the test/exam/requirement and one-day (1) suspension
sanctions.second_offense: Failure in the subject or Failure in the academic requirement and three-day (3) suspension
sanctions.third_offense: Failure in the subject or Failure in the academic requirement and Non-readmission

violations.description: Use of mobile phones during examinations
Talking with one another during examinations
Assisting or dictating answers to fellow examinees
Possession or passing of lecture notes or any materials during examination
Receiving information related to the exam from outside the examination room
Facilitating/aiding in the dissemination of leakage
Buying or selling of test questionnaires/papers or any portion thereof
Copying from or allowing another to copy from one's examination paper
Use of improvised or covert means/devices to carry out a cheating act during examination
Having somebody else to take the examination in his/her behalf
Passing as one's work any assigned report when copied from another
Asking another person to attend symposium, seminar, and exams in his/her behalf
Plagiarism in connection with any academic work
Misdeeds caught in the act or reported which may be determined as academic dishonesty
